name: Bounty Clicker
description: Welcome to Bounty Clicker In this story you play as the antagonist, a creature that has a bounty put on your head because it is believed that you have stolen a precious jewel that holds the power to the kingdom, it is your job to fight for your life and defeat the soldiers and bounty hunters that the King has sent to kill you. To remain hidden, you buy upgrades for your weapons at the black markets. Along your journey, you make unprincipled friends that are willing to help you escape on one condition, you offer them money.
